markdownRemark.html:
mapbox globe

Mapbox recently released a new feature called globe.You can support changing personalized skins using raster layers, and you can also use terrain data. However, custom layers are not currently supported.

official website：https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/example/globe/
terrain：https://codepen.io/qian4321/pen/yLKLqKv

previous.excerpt: 这个css属性(font-variant-numeric)是这篇文章中给我震撼最大的一个，这个属性可以用来控制数字。其中tabular-nums可以使数字等宽，易于像表格那样对齐。这篇文章还有其它属性感觉会在不久的将来派上用场，先有个印象吧。 参考(原文)：https://www…
